item.title: The five dysfunctions of a team and how to tackle these
item.description: Introduction “The Five Dysfunctions of a Team” is a book by Patrick Lencioni. The first time I read about it was in 2020 while reading the phenomenal book “The Phoenix Project”. To be honest, I did not read the original book by Patrick Lencioni (I am too lazy üòè - sorry!). However, I do think that having contemplated about the model, which summarizes the five dysfunctions, in combination with my work experience gives me a deeper understanding which I would like to share with you.
